programme.title: ATTENTION: WWE Network will shut down on December 31, 2024
programme.desc: PLEASE READ: WWE Network content is moving to Netflix internationally in 2025, alongside their classic programming, current shows and Premium Live Events, including WWE Raw. However, PLE’s are still going to be available to watch on our PPV channels and available On Demand, the day after they air. Everyone at ETV thanks everyone for the support you’ve given to the WWE Network’s feed through our service for the past four years as we still are the only service to offer the channel in Puerto Rico without the need to pay for a separate subscription. We also apologize for the inconvenience this may cause.
